        public boolean checkCurrent(String _plainPassword)
        Check the given Plain Text Password for equal on the current Hash by applying the algorithm salt etc.
        Parameters:
        _plainPassword - plain text password
        Returns:
        true if equal, else false

      • isRepeated

        public boolean isRepeated(String _plainPassword)
        Is the given plain password repeated. It is checked against the existing previous passwords.
        Parameters:
        _plainPassword - plain text password
        Returns:
        true if repeated, else false
